title: Vision should NOT count towards your grade achieved upon ending the game.
body:
I disagree with vision score being included in your end game grade. I main mid fizz, and as an assassin and game carry, to win games i must focus on buying items, not spending gold on control wards. Often, in these cases where i need to prioritize items over warding, I miss out on getting even an S- due to lower vision score, even though I carried and we won the game.

I win more games when I don't buy wards when playing hard carry champs, so i will keep getting A's due to lower vision score. Doesn't make sense to me though... or maybe if they just excluded control wards from counting towards vision score it would work better.

replies.body:
One word:

Trinkets.

They are *completely free* and will allow you to maintain a reasonable vision score when used correctly.

Maybe you should just stop ignoring what is essentially a *free* item slot...

You have greatly underestimate how crucial vision control is in league...
SR isn't a map you simply run forward and kill all enemies you see, thats ARAM

A simple list of what good vision control can provide you,

* Spots incoming ganks
* Track junglers 
* Spots invades  
* Determines lane aggression
* Provides good TP flanks and allow split push
* Objective control

And a control ward can deny all of the above at cost of 75g, so what are you waiting for, buy control wards next game!

_Ward saves lives, buy a ward today!_
